page.title: 19GOVERNMENT IN DALBEATTIE
page.content: There are three different levels of local government in this area.These are: (1)Dalbeattie Community Council (2)Stewartry District Council (3)Dumfries & Galloway Regional Council The{Community Council}is always looking to improve Dalbeattie.It was mainly responsible for the Flood Prevention Scheme being started.It is now trying to have a hospital built in the town. The {District Council}deals with such things as housing,burial grounds, caravan sites,disposal of refuse, etc. The{Dumfries & Galloway Regional {Council}deals with other important matters like education,finance,roads and transportation as well as water and sewerage.
